{"id":968941863,"question_id":724,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1686496205,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"30 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/968941863/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        \n        int left = 0;\n        int right = 0;\n        int ans = -1;\n\n        for(int i=1; i<nums.size(); i++){\n            right += nums[i];\n        }\n        if(right == 0){\n            return 0;\n        }\n\n        for(int i=1; i<nums.size(); i++){\n\n            left += nums[i-1];\n            right -= nums[i];\n\n            if(left == right){\n                ans = i;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
